phone2spl(phones, tf, af, lu)[source]ÔÉÅ

Conversion from phones to Sound Pressure Level (dB SPL), based on the standard ISO/FDIS 226:2003.

Parameters:

  • phones (float) ‚Äì Logarithmic unit of loudness (‚Äòphon‚Äô = Ln).

  • tf (float) ‚Äì Threshold of hearing.

  • af (float) ‚Äì Exponent used for loudness perception.

  • lu (float) ‚Äì Factor of the linear transfer function normalized at 1 kHz.

Returns:

spl ‚Äì Sound pressure level (‚ÄòdB SPL‚Äô).
